name: Iustin Ivlev
goal:
Insure reasonable privacy for all people either at work, over internet or at home.
Make governance a public act and educate people to take responsibility for making the policies that build the society.
interests: Communication, Competition, Culture, Development, Education, Enterprise, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Regulation (EU) 2016/679 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data.
